title: What is the procedure for the CBSE 12th improvement exam? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: You have low percentage in 12th No need to worry CBSE gives you an opportunity to improve your marks in whichever subject you want.Between October and November, CBSE brings out application forms for improvement on its web site.You have to fill the form online.CBSE provides a link for the improvement on its web site, you have to register with your roll number and details which will be on your 12th board admit card by going to that link, then you have to choose the subject in which you want to give the improvement, then you have to pay its registration fee, your registration is done.Then you will have to verify that application by going to your regional CBSE office.Its admit card arrives in January You will have to download it from the CBSE web site After the result of the improvement, your mark sheet will be delivered to your house. It is look like   You can give an improvement only once in consecutive year. You can give improvement in one or a few subjects or you can also give it in all 5 subjects. I give you a link of 12th cbse improvement information brochure 2019https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=http://cbse.nic.in/newsite/attach/Final%2520private%25202019%2520-%2520Class%2520XII.pdf&ved=2ahUKEwiMpf2giJ7kAhW06nMBHf3zAqIQFjAAegQIBRAB&usg=AOvVaw1FwXFvBenp82KjsE4bz6An Thank you.

Just go to your old school from where you passed your 12th and ask them for improvement exam form , either they will give you form or will give you the address of another school where forms are available or just go to these link Welcome to Central Board of Secondary Education then click on form and download the form the take a print out of it . Fill the form and go to your old school and take the signature and stamp of your principle and school respectively . Send it to the mentioned address given in the form by speed post . Once done you will get admit card in the end of february by post .
